title: Video Editor
description:
We are looking for a talented editor for our upcoming VOD-Platform, bySurfTV.

Once or twice a month, you'll recieve a blank .mp4 with the voiceover and music laid out, it's your job to fill in your assigned section with compelling animations, stock footage, nothing too over the top or brain-rot, but something that's easy to follow along and cleanly edited.

You'll be provided with our Stock Footage library and other resources you may need for the job.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in creative work (preferably documentaries)
able to adapt to a given style or present your own
application_requirements: Send us your work-reel and discord username, aswell as your time-zone and why you want to work with us.
